com.abcjobs.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abcjobs.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Controller class handles HTTP requests related to user profiles. It provides the methods for showing the forgot password page, profile page, update profile details included the education details.

    This controller depends on the services provided by the UserAccountService, UserProfileService for the update profile process.

    Uses the LocationService to retrieve the list of countries and cities for populating the options of location selection in the update profile basic details form.

    EducationService for managing and retrieve all the education records of the current user.

    Author:
    Ch'ng Sin Yi
    See Also:
    UserAccountService, UserProfileService, LocationService, EducationService
